project.description: Build the docker image for cor-main

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: GIT_REPULL
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: Before building the image, should the content on which it is based be pulled again from its git repository?

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' style='width:400px;' disabled=true>"

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: GIT_REPO_URL
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: The git repository from which the build will pull source code.

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' style='width:400px;' disabled=true>"

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: GIT_BRANCH
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description: The branch to be pulled and checked out for the cor-main source code

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' style='width:400px;' disabled=true>"

org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: GIT_REFSPEC
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description:
From the specified branch, pick an explicit commit.
Leave this blank to select the HEAD of the selected branch.

secureFallbackScript.script: return "<input type='text' name='value' value='error' style='width:400px;' disabled=true>"

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
buildcontext='/tmp/krd/core/build.context' if [ ! -d $buildcontext ] ; then echo "ERROR! Cannot find docker build context directory: $buildcontext" exit 1 fi
cd $buildcontext
parms=( "interactive=false" "git_repull=$GIT_REPULL" "git_branch=$GIT_BRANCH" "git_refspec=$GIT_REFSPEC" "dryrun=$DRYRUN" )
source docker.sh
build "${parms[@]}"
